會不會.definition: (posing a question: whether sb, something) can or cannot?; is able to or not

會元.definition: provincial imperial examination graduate who ranked 1st in metropolitan examination (in Ming and Qing dynasties)

會友.definition: to make friends; to meet friends; member of the same organization

會合.definition: to meet; to rendezvous; to merge; to link up; meeting; confluence

會同縣.definition: Huitong county in Huaihua 懷化|怀化[Huai2 hua4], Hunan

會否.definition: can or cannot; is it possible?

會哭的孩子有奶吃.pinyin: hui4 ku1 de5 hai2 zi5 you3 nai3 chi1
會哭的孩子有奶吃.definition: lit. a child who cries gets to feed at the breast (idiom); fig. the squeaky wheel gets the grease

會哭的孩子有糖吃.pinyin: hui4 ku1 de5 hai2 zi5 you3 tang2 chi1
會哭的孩子有糖吃.definition: lit. the child who cries gets the candy (idiom); fig. the squeaky wheel gets the grease

會商.definition: to confer; to consult; to negotiate; to hold a conference

會場.definition: meeting place; place where people gather; CL:個|个[ge4]

會士.definition: member of religious order; penitent; frater; translation of French agregé (holder of teaching certificate)

會寧.definition: Huining county in Baiyin 白銀|白银[Bai2 yin2], Gansu

會寧縣.definition: Huining county in Baiyin 白銀|白银[Bai2 yin2], Gansu

會審.definition: joint hearing; to review jointly (i.e. with other checkers)

會展.definition: conferences and exhibitions (abbr. for 會議展覽|会议展览[hui4 yi4 zhan3 lan3])

會師.definition: to collaborate; to join forces; to effect a junction

會幕.definition: tabernacle (biblical word for a meeting hall or tent)

會意.definition: combined ideogram (one of the Six Methods 六書|六书[liu4 shu1] of forming Chinese characters); Chinese character that combines the meanings of existing elements; also known as joint ideogram or associative compound; to comprehend without being told explicitly; to cotton on; knowing (smile, glance etc)

會意字.definition: combined ideogram (one of the Six Methods 六書|六书 of forming Chinese characters); Chinese character that combines the meanings of existing elements; also known as joint ideogram or associative compound

會戰.definition: (military) to meet for a decisive battle; (military) battle; (fig.) large-scale concerted effort

會所.definition: office of an association; meeting place; clubhouse; club

會昌.definition: Huichang county in Ganzhou 贛州|赣州[Gan4 zhou1], Jiangxi

會昌縣.definition: Huichang county in Ganzhou 贛州|赣州[Gan4 zhou1], Jiangxi

會期.definition: the duration of a conference; the period over which a conference (or expo etc) is held; session; the date of a meeting

會東.definition: see 會東縣|会东县[Hui4dong1 Xian4]

會東縣.definition: Huidong County in Liangshan Yi Autonomous Prefecture 涼山彝族自治州|凉山彝族自治州[Liang2shan1 Yi2zu2 Zi4zhi4zhou1], south Sichuan

會澤縣.definition: Huize county in Qujing 曲靖[Qu3 jing4], Yunnan

會理.definition: see 會理市|会理市[Hui4li3 Shi4]

會理市.definition: Huili, county-level city in Liangshan Yi Autonomous Prefecture 涼山彝族自治州|凉山彝族自治州[Liang2shan1 Yi2zu2 Zi4zhi4zhou1], Sichuan

會盟.definition: meetings conducted by rulers in feudal China for the purpose of formalizing alliances, finalizing treaties

會社.definition: a guild; (in olden times) an association such as a political party, religious group or trade guild; the Japanese word for company

會見.definition: to meet with (sb who is paying a visit); CL:次[ci4]

會計準則理事會.pinyin: kuai4 ji4 zhun3 ze2 li3 shi4 hui4

會診.definition: consultation (medical); to meet for diagnosis; (by extension) consultation of different specialists

會話.definition: (language learning) conversation; dialog; to converse (in a non-native language); (computing) session; CL:個|个[ge4],次[ci4]

會車.definition: (of two vehicles traveling in opposite directions) to pass by each other

會錯意.definition: to misunderstand; to get the wrong idea

會長.definition: president of a club, committee etc

會陰.definition: perineum; see 會陰穴|会阴穴[hui4yin1xue2]

會陰穴.definition: (TCM) acupuncture point CV-1, located on the perineum

會首.definition: head of a society; sponsor of an organization
